metadata.title: CVE-2016-7434 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
The read_mru_list function in NTP before 4.2.8p9 allows remote attackers tocause a denial of service (crash) via a crafted mrulist query.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7434` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ntp - 1:4.2.8p4+dfsg-3ubuntu5.5
ntpdate - 1:4.2.8p4+dfsg-3ubuntu5.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ntp package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:4.2.8p4+dfsg-3ubuntu5.5').
